changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, l.id, l.name, l.description, l.notes, r.name AS updated_by, l.version FROM location l JOIN agency r ON l.updated_by = r.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON r.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
